column1: I was about to paint my toe nails when my mom told me to put on my shoes to go to the store.
column2: I had just painted my toe nails when my mom told me to put on my shoes to go to the store.

column1: I called the ski resort to book a reservation. They gifted me a free ski lift ticket with my reservation.
column2: I called the ski resort to book a reservation. After booking, they gave me a free complimentary night.

column1: I added some butter, heavy cream, and salt to the mashed potatoes.
column2: I added some skim milk to the mashed potatoes.

column1: Me and my brother went to a malt shop. I bought a giant cream cheese shake.
column2: Me and my brother went to a malt shop. We got free milkshakes.

column1: I started breeding Boarder collies.  A healthy litter of puppies was born.
column2: I went to a wine tasting event with my mom and sister yesterday.  The admission was fairly cheap for the amount of wine available to try.

column1: When I washed the car today I had to scrub the mud to get it off.
column2: When I washed the car today all of the mud came right off.

column1: I found my old passport right after I reported it lost to the government.
column2: I found my old passport right before I reported it lost to the government.

column1: I have a lot of bitterness towards a baseball team that broke my heart.
column2: I have a lot of bitterness towards a girl that broke my heart.

column1: I just saw the memo from my Insurance agent that says See Me.
column2: I just saw the memo from my Postman that says See Me.

column1: I went crabbing up the coast. I was able to catch enough Crab to last all year.
column2: I went crabbing up the coast. I found a great, large Crab that got mention in a local blog.

column1: My friend planted one of their own hairs in their restaurant food.
column2: Today I unfortunately got a hole in my shoe.

column1: I filed my income tax. I was audited by the IRS.
column2: When I was sitting on the airplane in the aisle seat, a person sat in the middle seat.

column1: I accidentally stared directly into a bright lightbulb.
column2: I accidentally stared directly into the sun.

column1: I honked at a car in front of me and realized it was my son's school teacher.
column2: No matter how many times I ask my mom to let me walk to the store by myself, she insists on driving me.

column1: I won a free bouquet of orchards in a radio contest.
column2: I won a free bouquet of daisies in a radio contest.

column1: I felt useful because I got new voters registered today when volunteering.
column2: I felt useful because I got new manuals registered today when volunteering.

column1: I had to help my uncle brand the calves. I broke my leg when the calf knocked me backwards.
column2: I had to help my uncle brand the calves. The brander hit my leg, burning it.

column1: I watched the new SpaceX rocket launch from the bleachers at the space center.
column2: I watched the new SpaceX rocket launch from the couch in my living room.

column1: I made potato salad using ingredients my mother introduced me to. I entered it in the state fair and won first place.
column2: I made potato salad using ingredients my mother introduced me to. The salad was so good Safeway bought the recipe from me for 100,000.00

column1: I quit my job to become a freelancer.
column2: I quit my job to become a freelancer. After I pay double FICA taxes, I'm making less money for more work.
